strings.Value: [Search the belongings for information or valuables]
[Break the jars and spill the wine]
{n}The bandits' belongings are piled together in a messy heap.{/n}

{n}You find a cache under all the clothes and blankets. Opening the lid of a small hollow, you find a box full of bottles. An inscription on the side reads:{/n} "Wine for the Stag Lord. Don't you dare steal it, fools! I'll make sure you rot!"
